Megatron Revived:
 
Megatron was in the mess hall, drinking a large glass of energon when Kup called him on his comm.  Some unknown signal had shown up when the interferance from Unicron had faded.
 
"Understood.  I will contact you when I know what the signal is."
 
The Emperor clone stood up and left, shortly leaving the base and transforming into his vehicle mode.  He took high to the air, and flew toward the signal on the horizion.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:

OOC: Regarding that Kup and rodimus are Needed, I''l post with them.

Kup:

Kup had been working all those time trying to Erase the jamming in 
comunications. When the Jamming fade, he notices that an unknow 
signature was Several miles of maximal base... but, Kup consider his 
duties to find out who was. He opened comlink with Megatron.

"MEgatron do you copy???"said the Maximal"WE have a unknow signature 
300 miles of our base... can you go and findout who is? Be carefull, 
it may be a minion"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "jerame johnson" <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> 
> from a recent and uncalled situation Dracos Awakens to find 
himself 
> about 300 mile out of the reach of any Transformer base. As he 
runs 
> a self diognostic hefinds that allof his parts are working right. 
> Dracos then steps out unto the field from underneath a cave like 
> structure. and begins to scan around for any recent fights or 
signs 
> of struggle.
